name: The LEGO MOBA
description:
This game uses the LEGO game kit within the UNITY game engine. LEGO assets used are from the LEGO kit and the Bricklink Studio software. LEGO stuff is trademarked or whatever legal nonsense by the LEGO people.  You should totally buy LEGO and build physical versions of all the models in this game (for reals, they're all buildable with physical bricks).

Build parts in the crafting interface then use those parts to build bots. The enemy will send bots at your base so don't take too long !

WIP: Use the cheat buttons for extra bricks

==

green + yellow = wheels
red = cannon
wheels + cannon = baby wheeled bot

red + cannon = upgraded canon

green + yellow + yellow = legs
yellow + yellow + yellow = body
yellow + yellow = head

legs + body = legs+body
legs2 + head = legs+body+head
legs3 + weapon + weapon + armor = mega legged bot

blue = armour1
blue + blue = armor2
armor2 + purple = armor3

purple + red = stolen enemy blaster weapon
